title: 'Greatest of all time' Rickey Henderson dies at 65
description: Rickey Henderson, the greatest leadoff hitter and base stealer in Major League Baseball history, died Friday. He was 65.
author: Howard Bryant and Jeff Passan

title: Longhorns take down Clemson to advance in CFP
description: Jaydon Blue's 77-yard touchdown in the fourth quarter halted Clemson's rally and lifted Texas to a 38-24 win, setting up a CFP quarterfinal matchup against Arizona State.

title: College Football Playoff: Tennessee heads to The Shoe
description: Saturday's slate started with two convincing wins â€” can the nightcap between Ohio State and Tennessee have a bit more suspense? Follow along here!
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Rickey Henderson, baseball Hall of Famer and MLB stolen base king, dies at 65
description: Henderson played for nine teams in his 25-year MLB career and won two World Series and an AL MVP award.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Usyk denies Fury in intense world championship rematch
description: Oleksandr Usyk overcame Tyson Fury to defend his unified world heavyweight championships at the Kingdom Arena in Riyadh.

title: Final Usyk-Fury judge confirmed after coin toss settles rival camps' dispute
description: Ignacio Robles will be the third judge in Tyson Fury's world heavyweight championship clash with Oleksandr Usyk on Saturday night following a coin toss.

title: Usyk breaks Fury's heart with points win in rematch
description: Oleksandr Usyk defeats Briton Tyson Fury to retain his unified heavyweight world titles and prove his status as a generational great in another close points win in Saudi Arabia.

title: 'We have to find a way' - Guardiola vows to end relegation form
description: Pep Guardiola says Manchester City - who are on the joint worst run of form in the Premier League after a sixth defeat in eight games - 'have to find a way' to win again.
